Learners are challenged to develop and pitch their own social impact projects, with guidance from industry experts and peer feedback. This course fosters a sense of community, creativity, and social responsibility, empowering learners to drive positive change.

Learners can explore and manipulate 3D models, animations, and simulations to gain a deeper understanding of abstract ideas. This approach makes learning more engaging, interactive, and memorable.

**Real-World Case Studies and Mentorship**: Develop an online course that combines real-world case studies with mentorship and coaching.
